attributes.action: Implement the 30 hours free childcare legislation much quicker than Sept 2025
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living crisis is here and now affecting many people. The changes to childcare legislation are desperately needed now not by September 2025
attributes.background: The legislation giving 30 hours of free childcare to 1 and 2 year olds is not due to come fully into effect until September 2025. I would like government to bring this legislation forward so parents of today can get some relief during the cost of living crisis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634909
